---
title: "RemoteFileStorage"
description: "Base class for storage implementations that handle upload and download file storage and retrieval"
---

# RemoteFileStorage

Base class for storage implementations that handle upload and download file storage and retrieval.

## Methods

<CardGroup cols={2}>
  <Card
    title="__init__"
    icon="function"
    href="/sdk-reference/remotefilestorage/__init__"
  >
    Initialize self
  </Card>
  <Card
    title="download"
    icon="function"
    href="/sdk-reference/remotefilestorage/download"
  >
    Stores a file that has been downloaded from a website in the current session
  </Card>
  <Card
    title="get_file"
    icon="function"
    href="/sdk-reference/remotefilestorage/get_file"
  >
    Returns the local path for a file
  </Card>
  <Card
    title="instructions"
    icon="function"
    href="/sdk-reference/remotefilestorage/instructions"
  >
    Return LLM instructions to append to the prompt
  </Card>
  <Card
    title="list_downloaded_files"
    icon="function"
    href="/sdk-reference/remotefilestorage/list_downloaded_files"
  >
    List files that have been downloaded into storage by the agents
  </Card>
  <Card
    title="list_uploaded_files"
    icon="function"
    href="/sdk-reference/remotefilestorage/list_uploaded_files"
  >
    List files that have been uploaded to storage
  </Card>
  <Card
    title="set_file"
    icon="function"
    href="/sdk-reference/remotefilestorage/set_file"
  >
    Stores a file from the local path
  </Card>
  <Card
    title="set_session_id"
    icon="function"
    href="/sdk-reference/remotefilestorage/set_session_id"
  >
    No description available
  </Card>
  <Card
    title="upload"
    icon="function"
    href="/sdk-reference/remotefilestorage/upload"
  >
    Upload a file from your local machine to storage
  </Card>
</CardGroup>

## Class Information

<Info>
**Module:** `notte_sdk.endpoints.files`
**Inheritance:** RemoteFileStorage → BaseStorage → ABC
</Info>
